column4: so I'm trying to set up a vpn between my Oneiric Laptop and my Windows 7 desktop. The connection works, but the remote desktop vieweronly returns a blank black screen. Anyone able to help me figure out what's going on?
hm.. i think you mix up some things... do you want vpn or vnc?
do you want to control the other computer remotely?
ok, first of, vpn is "virual private network" it is for establishing secure network connections, not more not less... it got not too much to do with remote control
except if you might want to secure your remote communication
what you want now is a software the manages the remote control
so what you want is  program called vnc on your windows computer and vnc on your linux compter
is responsible for sending the screen of the windows computer to your linux computer and seding the keyboard input from linux to windows
vnc is the best know program in that area
makes sense sofar. Vinigre is Oneiric's built in remote desktop viewer
i am not sure if the linux desktop viewer will work with windows
i was never in the situation to remote control a windows computer from linux ... once i was but the i used teamviewer ... it's a quick and dirty solution
if you are sure that the remoteviewer can handle windows then head on... i am sure there is a good tutoral or how-to in the interwebs
